description: Make organizing, navigating and manipulating documents and media more efficient The FileManagerSphere is a powerful file management tool designed to simplify and enhance your experience when dealing with documents, media, and other file types. With advanced features and an intuitive interface, FileManagerSphere provides a comprehensive solution for organizing, navigating, searching, and manipulating your files with ease. Features - Open source: Lightweight, clean, and secure. - Material Design: Follows the Material Design guidelines, with attention to details. - File support: View, extract, and create common compressed files. - Themes: Customizable user interface colors, plus optional true black night mode. - Elegant widgets that automatically adapt to your size - Well-implemented: Built upon the right things, including Java NIO File API and LiveData.
